code: function randomText(length){var result='';var characters='ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZabcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz0123456789';var charactersLength=characters.length;for(var i=0;i<length;i++){result+=characters.charAt(Math.floor(Math.random()*charactersLength));}return result;}export default randomText;
